title: MTSS Delivery Method Analysis
text:
## Initial Project Visualization

#| label: fig-mtss
#| fig-cap: "Average Improvement Index by Delivery Method"
#| echo: true
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)

── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.6
✔ forcats   1.0.1     ✔ stringr   1.6.0
✔ ggplot2   4.0.1     ✔ tibble    3.3.0
✔ lubridate 1.9.4     ✔ tidyr     1.3.1
✔ purrr     1.1.0     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors

# Ensure your CSV is in the 'data' folder of your project

df <- read_csv("Interventions_Studies_And_Findings_clean.csv")

Rows: 13280 Columns: 285
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr  (28): i_Intervention_Name, i_Protocol, i_Outcome_Domain, i_Intervention...
dbl (226): ReviewID, i_InterventionID, i_Protocol_Version, i_NumStudiesMeeti...
lgl  (31): i_Demographics_Sample_International, i_Ethnicity_Not_Hispanic, i_...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

# Calculate means 
mtss_data <- df %>% 
  summarise( 
    `Small-Group (Tiers 2 & 3)` = mean(f_Improvement_Index[s_Delivery_Method_Small_Group %in% 1], na.rm = TRUE), 
    `Whole-Class (Tier 1)` = mean(f_Improvement_Index[s_Delivery_Method_Whole_Class %in% 1], na.rm = TRUE) 
  ) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = everything(), names_to = "Method", values_to = "Avg_Improvement")

# Create the visualization
ggplot(mtss_data, aes(x = reorder(Method, Avg_Improvement), y = Avg_Improvement, fill = Method)) + 
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") + 
  geom_text(aes(label = round(Avg_Improvement, 2)), vjust = -0.5) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs( 
    title = "Average Improvement Index by Delivery Method", 
    x = "Delivery Method", 
    y = "Average Improvement Index" 
  ) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#1f77b4", "#ff7f0e")) + 
  theme(legend.position = "none")

title: MTSS Delivery Method Analysis
text:
## Initial Project Visualization

#| label: fig-mtss
#| fig-cap: "Average Improvement Index by Delivery Method"
#| echo: true
#| warning: false

library(tidyverse)

    `Whole-Class (Tier 1)` = mean(f_Improvement_Index[s_Delivery_Method_Whole_Class %in% 1], na.rm = TRUE)

  pivot_longer(cols = everything(), names_to = "Method", values_to = "Avg_Improvement")

  geom_text(aes(label = round(Avg_Improvement, 2)), vjust = -0.5) +

  theme(legend.position = "none")

title: Education Research: MTSS Implementation Outcomes Analysis
text:
Final Project: MTSS Data Analysis Course: EDLD 652 | Data Visualization | Winter 2026
Project Overview
This project investigates how various levels of support within the Multi-Tiered System of Supports (MTSS) framework influence student growth. By analyzing intervention data, I aim to identify which strategies most effectively improve student from culturally outcomes.
Research Questions
1- Do small-group lessons (Tiers 2 & 3) yield higher improvement than whole-class teaching (Tier 1)?
2- Which Tiers are most effective for minority students compared to non-minority students?
3- Does student behavior improve more when teachers receive specialized training?
Analysis: Research Question 1
Question: Do small-group lessons (Tiers 2 & 3) help more than whole-class teaching (Tier 1)?
